data.message: How  to  get  my  FB   account  ( using  from 2007 )   verified      ?

replies.message: Hey Masuk. If you're an admin of a local business Page, you may be eligible for a gray verification badge, which you'll see in your Page's settings. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1QDcFnZ. If your Page represents a celebrity, public figure, sports team, media or entertainment, you may be eligible for a blue verification badge. To see if your Page is eligible, please fill out this form: http://on.fb.me/1QDcE3v. -Jordan
